name: Parallax Scroll – Parallax Scrolling Backgrounds & Call to Action WordPress Plugin
author: LogicHunt Inc.

sections.description:
Parallax Scroll is a Parallax Section Builder plugin for WordPress. The Easiest Way to Get a Parallax Scrolling Background Image with Desired Message, Title, and Logo on Your WordPress Website.

Parallax Scroll by LogicHunt.com

Live Demo | Docs | Support | Product Page

Are you looking to enhance your website’s design and user experience? Parallax Scroll WP is the perfect plugin for you! With its easy-to-use interface and powerful features, you can create stunning parallax effects on your website in no time.

What is Parallax Scrolling?

Parallax scrolling is a popular design technique that creates an illusion of depth in a website’s design. As the user scrolls down the page, the background images move at a different speed than the foreground elements, creating a visually appealing effect.

Parallax Scroll is an Amazing WordPress Parallax Scrolling Background plugin to Build a Responsive and Attractive section with a Background Parallax Effect on WordPress Site.

Basic Input Fields

  • Title
  • Background Image
  • Description

Why Choose Parallax Scroll WP?

Parallax Scroll WP is a versatile plugin that allows you to add parallax scrolling effects to any element on your website, including text, images, and backgrounds. The plugin is incredibly easy to use and requires no coding skills. With a few clicks, you can create stunning parallax scrolling effects that will impress your visitors and make your website stand out from the crowd.

Key Features

  • Simple and easy to use interface.
  • Add parallax effects to any element on your website.
  • Customize the parallax scrolling speed and direction.
  • Choose from multiple animation styles.
  • SEO-friendly and lightweight.
  • Compatible with all WordPress themes and plugins.
  • One-Click & unlimited Shortcode Generator.
  • Use multiple instances on same Page.
  • Show unlimited Parallax Section.
  • Image, Title, Description option for each item.
  • Separate Settings for Each Shortcode.
  • User-friendly Shortcode Generator.
  • Customize background, overlay, padding and more.
  • Well Organized allow to Customize Easily.

Exclusive FEATURES OF THE PLUGIN INCLUDES

Our plugin is the most advanced and user-friendly parallax scrolling solution on the market. Here are just a few reasons why you should choose Parallax Scroll WP:

  • Easy-to-use: Our plugin is designed with ease-of-use in mind. You don’t need any coding skills to create stunning parallax scrolling effects on your website.

  • Customizable: With Parallax Scroll WP, you can customize the speed and direction of the parallax effect, choose from multiple animation styles, and set different effects for mobile devices and desktops.

  • SEO-friendly: Our plugin is lightweight and optimized for search engines, so you can enhance your website’s design without sacrificing performance or visibility.

  • Compatible: Parallax Scroll WP is compatible with all WordPress themes and plugins, so you can use it with any website.

  • Support: Our dedicated support team is always here to help you with any questions or issues you may have. We’re committed to making sure you get the most out of our plugin.

Get Started Today

Download Parallax Scroll WP today and take your website design to the next level. With its powerful features and easy-to-use interface, you can create stunning parallax scrolling effects that will leave your visitors impressed. Upgrade your website design today with Parallax Scroll WP! Product Page

For fast support, features request, and bug reporting

If you have any problem or feature request for this plugin, please feel free to contact us!
Contact Us! | Get Support

sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

This is the simplest method of installing a plugin.

  1. Log in to your WordPress dashboard
  2. Navigate to “Plugins > Add New”
  3. Find the search form in the top-right and type “parallax-scroll-wp”
  4. To install the plugin click the “Install Now”
  5. Click “Activate” to activate the plugin

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download the “parallax-scroll-wp.zip” from WordPress.org
  2. Log in to your WordPress dashboard
  3. Navigate to “Plugins > Add New”
  4. Click the “Upload Plugin” at the top of the screen.
  5. Select “parallax-scroll-wp.zip” from your computer
  6. Click ‘Install Now’
  7. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
